column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We arrived to Chicago for the first time
column2: and wanted to try its famous deep dish pizza. We checked Yelp and chose the restaurant Â with the highest ranking
column3: which was Lou Malnati's. The place is pretty packed
column4: we had to wait for 10 minutes
column5: we made a preorder though. Anyways
column6: we were waiting our pizza for 40 mins
column7: although it is said 30 mins to make it. It couldn't be a problem if the pizza wouldn't be such a disappointment. It's really hard to call it "deep dish" pizza
column8: because it was pretty thin. And it was warm
column10: so we ate the second slices cold. The waiter was nice. Beer was good too.
